name: Undercut Banks/Overhanging Veg
functionStatement: Channel and floodplain structure supply depth, velocity, substrate diversity, and vegetation to support native organisms through all life stages.
descriptionMarkdown: Provides shelter unless historically minimal in certain ecoregions.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Percent bank length with overhang cover

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Banks straight and hardened. Little to no overhanging vegetation.
Criteria: <10% cover.

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Short isolated undercut pockets. Many bare or armored banks.
Criteria: About 10-25% cover.

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Intermittent undercuts and low branches in meanders.
Criteria: About 25-50% cover.

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Thick root mats and overhanging shrubs along outside bends.
Criteria: About 50% or more of banks provide undercut or overhanging cover.
